mapper.select: SELECT ingredient_avg_id AS ingredientAvgId, ingredient_id as ingredientId, ingredient_avg_date AS ingredientAvgDate, ingredient_avg_previous_price AS ingredientAvgPreviousPrice, ingredient_avg_price AS ingredientAvgPrice, ingredient_avg_predict_price AS ingredientAvgPredictPrice FROM ingredient_avg WHERE ingredient_id = #{ingredientId} AND ingredient_avg_date=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%y-%c-%e")
SELECT ingredient_avg_price - ingredient_avg_previous_price FROM ingredient_avg WHERE ingredient_id = #{ingredientId} AND ingredient_avg_date=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%y-%c-%e")
SELECT ingredient_avg_price FROM ingredient_avg WHERE ingredient_id = #{ingredientId} AND ingredient_avg_date=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%y-%c-%e")
